item.title: Pixel Art Search
item.description: Those familiar with 2D game development probably already know what a tileset is. Instead of creating every scene from scratch, you reuse small square images (tiles) and arrange them in a grid to build a game world. It’s like digital LEGO: you have a collection of pieces that you can combine in endless ways. Here’s an example:
